Rulings.Base: 1. The effect to equip this card to a new monster when it's sent to the GY starts a Chain.\n2. You can activate the effect to equip this card to a new monster even during the Damage Step.

PSCT.Base: The equipped monster loses 600 ATK for each monster you control. When this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard: You can target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; equip it with this card.
